snippet: Spirit Airlines, a low-fare, high-fees carrier with a clientele of mostly leisure travelers, had by far the worst on-time performance in June among 14 airlines tracked in a government report.
abstract: Budget carrier Spirit Airlines charts by far the worst on-time performance in June among 14 airlines, with just 49.9 percent of its flights arriving within 15 minutes of schedule.
lead_paragraph: Spirit Airlines, a low-fare, high-fees carrier with a clientele of mostly leisure travelers, had by far the worst on-time performance in June among 14 airlines tracked in a government report.

headline.main: Half of Spirit Airlines Flights Arrived Late in June
headline.print_headline: Half of Spirit Airlines Flights Arrived Late In June
